creator: nachtigall@web.de
summary: Regression: RSS add-on `brief` not suggested as 'Subscribe to this feed using' any more

assigned_to_detail.name: nobody@mozilla.org
assigned_to_detail.real_name: Nobody; OK to take it and work on it

comments.text:
STR:

1. Have brief installed as add-on: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/brief/
2. Go to a RSS feed like https://blog.nightly.mozilla.org/feed/

AR:

It is not possible to subscribe to the feed using `brief`.

ER:

Normally it was possible to select `brief` from the `Subscribe to this feed using` dropdown.

I run again mozregression and this pointed me to 

```
$ mozregression.exe --good 2018-03-01 --bad 2018-05-07 --addon Downloads/brief-2.5.5-an+fx.xpi --arg="https://www.xxxxwebsitexxxx/feed/"
[...]
===== Downloaded 100% =====
 5:11.11 INFO: Running mozilla-central build built on 2018-03-27 12:12:08.370000, revision 97cdd8fe
 5:13.44 INFO: Launching c:\Users\jnachtigall\AppData\Local\Temp\tmpcbkvzl\firefox\firefox.exe
 5:13.44 INFO: Application command: c:\Users\jnachtigall\AppData\Local\Temp\tmpcbkvzl\firefox\firefox.exe https://www.flyingroasters.de/de/feed/ -profile c:\users\jnacht~1\appdata\local\temp\tmpuh8y55.mozrunner
 5:13.51 INFO: application_buildid: 20180327091652
 5:13.51 INFO: application_changeset: 97cdd8febc40ac6025bce5dec9f8dadb8e62f906
 5:13.51 INFO: application_name: Firefox
 5:13.51 INFO: application_repository: https://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central
 5:13.51 INFO: application_version: 61.0a1
Was this inbound build good, bad, or broken? (type 'good', 'bad', 'skip', 'retry', 'back' or 'exit' and press Enter): b
 5:27.92 INFO: Narrowed inbound regression window from [40ef480e, 6d13f96e] (3 builds) to [40ef480e, 97cdd8fe] (2 builds) (~1 steps left)
 5:27.92 INFO: No more inbound revisions, bisection finished.
 5:27.92 INFO: Last good revision: 40ef480efa7a4dd38fa7f6c7d167d296dd0a401a
 5:27.92 INFO: First bad revision: 97cdd8febc40ac6025bce5dec9f8dadb8e62f906
 5:27.92 INFO: Pushlog:
https://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/pushloghtml?fromchange=40ef480efa7a4dd38fa7f6c7d167d296dd0a401a&tochange=97cdd8febc40ac6025bce5dec9f8dadb8e62f906

 5:30.15 ERROR: Unable to exploit the merge commit. Origin branch is mozilla-central, and the commit message for 97cdd8fe was:
Merge mozilla-central to inbound.  a=merge CLOSED TREE
```

Unfortunately, looking at the pushlog at https://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/pushloghtml?fromchange=40ef480efa7a4dd38fa7f6c7d167d296dd0a401a&tochange=97cdd8febc40ac6025bce5dec9f8dadb8e62f906 it consists of 4-5 different bugs and I am not sure how to make sense of it.

But maybe someone else cold shed some light on this.

Maybe, also possible, some old XUL functions was removed that brief was still relying upon, I don't know...
comments.author: nachtigall@web.de

comments.text: Not an XUL function that was removed, it was relying on a security bug in the feed preview page to inject itself into the list. It doing something else instead is https://github.com/ancestorak/brief/issues/343
comments.author: philringnalda@gmail.com
